items.title: Nope
items.plot: The residents of a lonely gulch in inland California bear witness to an uncanny and chilling discovery.
items.stars: Daniel Kaluuya, Keke Palmer, Brandon Perea, Michael Wincott

items.title: Thor: Love and Thunder
items.plot: Thor enlists the help of Valkyrie, Korg and ex-girlfriend Jane Foster to fight Gorr the God Butcher, who intends to make the gods extinct.
items.stars: Chris Hemsworth, Natalie Portman, Christian Bale, Tessa Thompson

items.title: The Black Phone
items.plot: After being abducted by a child killer and locked in a soundproof basement, a 13-year-old boy starts receiving calls on a disconnected phone from the killer's previous victims.
items.stars: Mason Thames, Madeleine McGraw, Ethan Hawke, Jeremy Davies

items.title: Where the Crawdads Sing
items.plot: A woman who raised herself in the marshes of the deep South becomes a suspect in the murder of a man she was once involved with.
items.stars: Daisy Edgar-Jones, Taylor John Smith, Harris Dickinson, David Strathairn

items.title: Top Gun: Maverick
items.plot: After more than thirty years of service as one of the Navy's top aviators, Pete Mitchell is where he belongs, pushing the envelope as a courageous test pilot and dodging the advancement in rank that would ground him.
items.stars: Tom Cruise, Jennifer Connelly, Miles Teller, Val Kilmer

items.title: Elvis
items.plot: The life of American music icon Elvis Presley, from his childhood to becoming a rock and movie star in the 1950s while maintaining a complex relationship with his manager, Colonel Tom Parker.
items.stars: Tom Hanks, Austin Butler, Olivia DeJonge, Helen Thomson

items.title: Shamshera
items.plot: In the fictitious city of Kaza, a warrior tribe is imprisoned, enslaved and tortured by a ruthless authoritarian Shudh Singh. Shamshera is a legend for his tribe who relentlessly fights for his tribe's freedom and dignity.
items.stars: Ranbir Kapoor, Sanjay Dutt, Vaani Kapoor, Saurabh Shukla

items.title: Everything Everywhere All at Once
items.plot: An aging Chinese immigrant is swept up in an insane adventure, where she alone can save the world by exploring other universes connecting with the lives she could have led.
items.stars: Michelle Yeoh, Stephanie Hsu, Ke Huy Quan, James Hong

items.title: Jurassic World Dominion
items.plot: Four years after the destruction of Isla Nublar, dinosaurs now live--and hunt--alongside humans all over the world. This fragile balance will reshape the future and determine, once and for all, whether human beings are to remain the apex predators on a planet they now share with history's most fearsome creatures in a new Era.
items.stars: Chris Pratt, Bryce Dallas Howard, Laura Dern, Sam Neill

items.title: DC League of Super-Pets
items.plot: Krypto the Super-Dog and Superman are inseparable best friends, sharing the same superpowers and fighting crime side by side in Metropolis. However, Krypto must master his own powers for a rescue mission when Superman is kidnapped.
items.stars: Dwayne Johnson, Kevin Hart, Kate McKinnon, John Krasinski

items.title: Minions: The Rise of Gru
items.plot: The untold story of one twelve-year-old's dream to become the world's greatest supervillain.
items.directors: Kyle Balda, Brad Ableson, Jonathan del Val
items.stars: Steve Carell, Pierre Coffin, Alan Arkin, Taraji P. Henson

items.title: Vengeance (II) (2022)
items.plot: A writer from New York City attempts to solve the murder of a girl he hooked up with and travels down south to investigate the circumstances of her death and discover what happened to her.
items.stars: B.J. Novak, Boyd Holbrook, Dove Cameron, Issa Rae

items.title: Paws of Fury: The Legend of Hank
items.fullTitle: Paws of Fury: The Legend of Hank (2022)
items.plot: Hank, a loveable dog with a head full of dreams about becoming a samurai, sets off in search of his destiny.
items.directors: Chris Bailey, Mark Koetsier, Rob Minkoff
items.stars: Michael Cera, Samuel L. Jackson, Ricky Gervais, Kylie Kuioka

items.title: Mrs Harris Goes to Paris
items.plot: A widowed cleaning lady in 1950s London falls madly in love with a couture Dior dress, and decides that she must have one of her own.
items.stars: Jason Isaacs, Lesley Manville, Alba Baptista, Rose Williams

items.title: Vikrant Rona
items.plot: Almost half a century ago, a remote village in the middle of a tropical rainforest starts witnessing a series of unexplainable events which they attribute to the supernatural.
items.stars: Sudeep, Nirup Bhandari, Neetha Ashok, Jacqueline Fernandez

items.title: Marcel the Shell with Shoes On
items.fullTitle: Marcel the Shell with Shoes On (2021)
items.plot: Feature adaptation of the animated short film interviewing a mollusk named Marcel.
items.stars: Jenny Slate, Dean Fleischer-Camp, Isabella Rossellini, Joe Gabler

items.title: Resurrection
items.plot: Margaret's life is in order. She is capable, disciplined, and successful. Everything is under control. That is, until David returns, carrying with him the horrors of Margaret's past.
items.stars: Rebecca Hall, Tim Roth, Grace Kaufman, Michael Esper

items.title: Ek Villain Returns
items.plot: The story of two men in one sided love. The paths they choose to fulfill their love stories decide who the Hero is and who is the Villain.
items.stars: Disha Patani, Tara Sutaria, John Abraham, Arjun Kapoor

items.title: Sing
items.plot: In a city of humanoid animals, a hustling theater impresario's attempt to save his theater with a singing competition becomes grander than he anticipates even as its finalists find that their lives will never be the same.
items.stars: Matthew McConaughey, Reese Witherspoon, Seth MacFarlane, Scarlett Johansson

items.title: Fire of Love
items.plot: Intrepid scientists and lovers Katia and Maurice Krafft died in a volcanic explosion doing the very thing that brought them together: unraveling the mysteries of volcanoes by capturing the most explosive imagery ever recorded.
items.stars: Miranda July, Katia Krafft, Maurice Krafft

items.title: Blazing Saddles
items.plot: In order to ruin a western town, a corrupt politician appoints a black Sheriff, who promptly becomes his most formidable adversary.
items.stars: Cleavon Little, Gene Wilder, Slim Pickens, Harvey Korman

items.title: Moonrise Kingdom
items.plot: A pair of young lovers flee their New England town, which causes a local search party to fan out to find them.
items.stars: Jared Gilman, Kara Hayward, Bruce Willis, Bill Murray

items.title: Wet Hot American Summer
items.plot: Set on the last day of camp, in the hot summer of 1981, a group of counselors try to complete their unfinished business before the day ends.
items.stars: Janeane Garofalo, David Hyde Pierce, Michael Showalter, Marguerite Moreau

items.title: The Legend (II) (2022)
items.plot: Saravanan, a foreign-educated researcher returns to his native place in India. His family runs colleges and hospitals. He crosses swords with a filthy-rich medical mafia with only commercial intentions.
items.stars: Saravanan Arul, Vijay Kumar, Mayilsamy, Nassar

items.title: Clifford the Big Red Dog
items.plot: A young girl's love for a tiny puppy named Clifford makes the dog grow to an enormous size.
items.stars: Darby Camp, Jack Whitehall, Izaac Wang, John Cleese

items.title: Smokey and the Bandit
items.plot: The Bandit is hired on to run a tractor-trailer full of beer over state lines, in hot pursuit by a pesky sheriff.
items.stars: Burt Reynolds, Sally Field, Jerry Reed, Mike Henry

items.title: Mahaveeryar
items.plot: Focuses on time travel, fantasy and court proceedings intertwined with emotional and funny moments.
items.stars: Lalu Alex, Asif Ali, Shailaja Ambu, Sudheer Karamana

items.title: The Croods: A New Age
items.plot: The prehistoric family the Croods are challenged by a rival family the Bettermans, who claim to be better and more evolved.
items.stars: Nicolas Cage, Emma Stone, Ryan Reynolds, Catherine Keener

items.title: The Boss Baby 2: Family Business
items.plot: The Templeton brothers have become adults and drifted away from each other, but a new boss baby with a cutting-edge approach is about to bring them together again - and inspire a new family business.
items.stars: Alec Baldwin, James Marsden, Amy Sedaris, Ariana Greenblatt

items.title: Kiki's Delivery Service
items.plot: A young witch, on her mandatory year of independent life, finds fitting into a new community difficult while she supports herself by running an air courier service.
items.stars: Kirsten Dunst, Minami Takayama, Rei Sakuma, Kappei Yamaguchi

items.title: The Secret Life of Pets 2
items.plot: Continuing the story of Max and his pet friends, following their secret lives after their owners leave them for work or school each day.
items.stars: Patton Oswalt, Kevin Hart, Harrison Ford, Eric Stonestreet

items.title: Thank You
items.plot: After a dramatic event happens, a successful man reviews the impactful moments in his life.
items.stars: Raashi Khanna, Naga Chaitanya Akkineni, Sai Sushanth Reddy, Aayush Agarwal

items.title: Chhalla Mud Ke Nahi Aaya
items.plot: Looking to earn money for his family, a young man in the early 1900s travels to Canada to join a small group of fellow Punjabis working in a lumber mill. While there, the men face difficult... See full summary
items.stars: Amrinder Gill, Sargun Mehta, Sydney Eberwein, Binnu Dhillon

items.title: Hansan: Rising Dragon
items.plot: Follow-up to 2014's The Admiral: Roaring Currents, which explores the historic Battle of Hansan Island.
items.stars: Park Hae-il, Yo-Han Byun, Sung-Ki Ahn, Hyang-gi Kim

items.title: Rama Rao on Duty
items.plot: Ramarao is a fair government officer who bends the rules when it comes to fighting the lapses in the system. When transferred to his own village, situations take him on a quest where he faces challenges and has to take on evil.
items.stars: Ravi Teja, Tanikella Bharani, Chammak Chandra, R.J. Hemant

items.title: Aguirre, the Wrath of God
items.plot: In the 16th century, the ruthless and insane Don Lope de Aguirre leads a Spanish expedition in search of El Dorado.
items.stars: Klaus Kinski, Ruy Guerra, Helena Rojo, Del Negro

items.title: Detective vs Sleuths
items.plot: When Hong Kong is rocked by multiple gruesome murders, the police forms a task force to investigate. Jun (Sean Lau), once a brilliant detective who suffered a mental breakdown, begins his ... See full summary
items.stars: Ching Wan Lau, Charlene Choi, Raymond Lam, Carman Lee

items.title: Abominable
items.plot: Three teenagers must help a Yeti return to his family while avoiding a wealthy man and a zoologist who want him for their own needs.
items.stars: Chloe Bennet, Albert Tsai, Tenzing Norgay Trainor, Joseph Izzo

items.title: All the Lord's Men
items.plot: A couple of Los Angeles detectives with no leads investigate nothing.
items.stars: Ilia Volok, Gracie Lacey, Noel Mirabal, Matt Fling

items.title: Dinosaurs of Antarctica
items.plot: Journey to the south polar landscapes of Antarctica hundreds of millions of years ago. Join Antarctic scientists on a quest to understand the ice continent's profound transformation, and predict the future as humans drive dramatic change.

items.title: Into America's Wild
items.plot: Step off the beaten path and connect to your inner trailblazer in this new adventure of the natural world. Starting at Oregon's stunning coast, explore the scenic byways, ancient homelands and many other wonderful natural scenarios.
items.stars: John Herrington, Ariel Tweto, Jennifer Pharr Davis, Emma Faye Rudkin
